languages.text: {n}Двойник кивает медленно и печально.{/n} "Прости меня, Ирлиэт Ланэвисс. Ты приняла на себя удар дракона кабала, предназначавшийся мне, но медике не смогли залечить твои раны. И все же... вновь увидеть тебя живой — огромная радость".

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."
languages.original_text: {n}Двойник кивает медленно и печально.{/n} "Прости меня, Ирлиэт Ланэвисс. Ты приняла на себя удар дракона кабала, предназначавшийся мне, но медике не смогли залечить твои раны. И все же... вновь увидеть тебя живой — огромная радость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and ruefully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Dracon of the Kabal's blow that was meant for me, but the medics were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and ruefully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Dracon of the Kabal's blow that was meant for me, but the medics were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and ruefully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dragon's blow that was meant for me, but the medicae were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and ruefully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dragon's blow that was meant for me, but the medicae were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

{n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

languages.text: {n}Tu alter ego asiente, lenta y pesarosamente.{/n} «Lo lamento, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Encajaste el golpe del Dracón de la Kábala que iba dirigido a mí y los cirujanos no pudieron tratar tus heridas. Sin embargo... me alegro de verte con vida».
languages.original_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu alter ego asiente, lenta y pesarosamente.{/n} «Lo lamento, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Encajaste el golpe del Dracón de la Kábala que iba dirigido a mí y los medicae no pudieron tratar tus heridas. Sin embargo... me alegro de verte con vida».

languages.text: {n}Votre alter ego hoche lentement la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Vous m'avez {mf|protégé|protégée} de l'attaque du dracon de la Kabale, mais les chirurgeons n'ont pas réussi à soigner vos blessures. C'est malgré tout une grande joie de vous voir en vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre alter ego hoche lentement la tête d'un air triste.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Vous m'avez {mf|protégé|protégée} de l'attaque du dragon de la Kabale, mais les medicae n'ont pas réussi à soigner vos blessures. C'est malgré tout une grande joie de vous voir en vie. »

languages.text: {n}あなたの分身は、ゆっくりと悲しげに頷く。{/n} 「許してくれ、ユリエット・ラナエフィス。お前はドラコン陰謀団の攻撃から私をかばってくれたのに、チラージョンはお前の傷を治せなかった。だけど…また生きて会うことができて本当に嬉しいよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの分身は、ゆっくりと悲しそうに頷く。{/n} 「許してくれ、ユリエット・ラナエフィス。お前はドラゴン陰謀団の攻撃から私をかばってくれたのに、メディケアではお前の傷を治せなかった。だけど…また生きて会うことができて本当に嬉しいよ」

languages.text: {n}你的复制人慢慢点着头，充满了悲伤。{/n}“请原谅我，伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝。那个阴谋团的执政官本打算杀我，可你替我挡下了那致命的一击，而且无论什么手段都无法治愈你的伤口。不过……看到你又活过来了，我可真开心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人慢慢点着头，充满了悲伤。{/n}“请原谅我，伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝。那个阴谋团的执政官本打算杀我，可你替我挡下了那致命的一击，而且无论什么手段都无法治愈你的伤口。不过……看到你又活过来了，我可真开心。”

languages.text: {n}Dein Alter ego nickt, langsam und voller Trauer.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Ihr habt den Hieb des Dracon der Kabale eingesteckt, der für mich bestimmt war, doch der Chirurgeum konnte Eure Wunden nicht heilen. Dennoch ... es ist eine große Freude, Euch wieder am Leben zu sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Your alter ego nods, slowly and sorrowfully.{/n} "Forgive me, Yrliet Lanaevyss. You took the Kabal Dracon's blow that was meant for me, but the chirurgeons were unable to heal your wounds. Still... it is a great joy to see you alive again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Alter ego nickt, langsam und reumütig.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Yrliet Lanaevyss. Ihr habt den Hieb des Dracon der Kabale eingesteckt, der für mich bestimmt war, doch die Medicae konnten Eure Wunden nicht heilen. Dennoch ... es ist eine große Freude, Euch wieder am Leben zu sehen."
